data.text:
Support Local Artists, Musicians & Creators

Help with the vitality of Mountain View by supporting the arts!

Want to help aspiring artists, musicians, creators and performers in our community? Make a donation of any amount. We will amplify their stories and find ways to make Mountain View a more culturally diverse place while supporting artists in our local community.

Monthly Artists Mountain View Meetups

We host monthly meetups at Red Rock Coffee on the 1st Wednesday of every month, from 5 - 7 pm. Artists and creatives can gather at each event, and artists present their stories, experiences, and advice to the group. For members who have attended at least three meetings out of the year, we offer a free shared booth space at the Mountain View Art & Wine Festival ($395 value), We want to empower creatives to have a safety net to pursue a career or passion in arts. YOU can even pick an aspiring artist for us to support by purchasing them a Chamber Membership!
